item.description:
Please join us for this fun night with our children on school vacation. Meet and mingle and see if we are what you are missing in your life.
Families/School Vacation-Pot Luck dinner and Pound Auction Tuesday, April 17, 6:30 pm, United Methodist Church, Woburn.
Bring something for the pot luck to share. What is a pound auction? Each family brings at least one wrapped item valued at $5 or less. The kids bid on the item usually in $.25 intercrements. This highest bidder wins the item. Mike will run the auction for the kids. Everyone will win a bid and usually for under $3. No one goes home empty handed. This has always been a great time for the kids. Be sure to RSVP so we can look for you when you arrive!! E-mail Sandi the organizer if you have any questions.
Directions to Woburn United Methodist Church – 523 Main Street, Woburn
Rt. 128/Rt. I-95 - Take exit 35/Rt. 38 toward Woburn/Wilmington. Go on Rt. 38 South/Main St. towards Woburn. Go just over a mile to the Church. Pass King Gas Station and take a left on Harlow Court (after the church). The hall is located on the left, near the back of the church building – the door is accessible on Harlow Court. Parking: There is on-street parking, or instead of taking the left onto Harlow Court, there is a municipal lot on Rt. 38 on the left after Express Fuel.
item.name: Open House/School Vacation/Pot Luck dinner and Pound Auction
